Uses of Interface
org.bson.ByteBuf

  • Packages that use ByteBuf 
    Package Description
    org.bson
    Contains the base BSON classes.

    • Uses of ByteBuf in org.bson

      Classes in org.bson that implement ByteBuf 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ByteBufNIO
      Implementation of ByteBuf which simply wraps an NIO ByteBuffer and forwards all calls to it.
      Methods in org.bson that return ByteBuf 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ByteBuf ByteBuf.asReadOnly()
      Creates a new, read-only byte buffer that shares this buffer's content.
      ByteBuf ByteBufNIO.asReadOnly()  
      ByteBuf ByteBuf.clear()
      Clears this buffer.
      ByteBuf ByteBufNIO.clear()

      Creates a new byte buffer that shares this buffer's content.
      ByteBuf ByteBufNIO.duplicate()  
      ByteBuf ByteBuf.flip()
      Flips this buffer.
      ByteBuf ByteBufNIO.flip()

      ByteBuf RawBsonDocument.getByteBuffer()
      Returns a ByteBuf that wraps the byte array, with the proper byte order.
